extendedInfo.description: Prepare for your UK Hazard Perception test (HPT) with this easy to use application featuring 10 OFFICIAL DSA Hazard Perception Revision Videos (suitable for Car, Motorcycle, LGV and PCV) â â â  Automatically stores HPT Videos on SD card saving your internal phone memory!  â â ââ â â From the developer of top rated driving theory test applications on iPhone, Mac and Android â â â Main advantages over the competition include: â 10 Full Official DSA Videos With Explanations âââ ANTI CHEATING MECHANISM âââ  Check whether your clicking style has a potential to be judged as inappropriate by DVLA â Extremely easy to use â Valid for Car, Motorcycle, LGV and PCV Driving Theory Test â Select any number of videos for your practice test â Comprehensive statistics average score and the number of clicks during last attempt â Hazard Perception test overview â in addition to the official introduction we have compiled some very useful information about the test which will help you to better understand what to do and how to succeed!

reviews.title: Best of the bunch
reviews.comment: Good number of videos for the price, clearest quality of the lot. Simple interface, official explanation, clear scoring that shows you what you have done and need to do differently to get it right. Makes the confusing game that is the Hazard Perception Test make some kind of sense. Passed first time largely thanks to this app properly clearing up what you are being tested on and when your clicks count.
reviews.author: Laura Trevail

reviews.title: Conned and robbed
reviews.comment: Made to think they were diferent by useing 2 diferent videos on \'lite\' than already worked on the theory + hazard when tryin to find just hazard and perception vidoes. Not surprising to then notice the only 2 diferent videos was not even on there. Discusted.
reviews.author: Giovanni Pearson

reviews.title: A must for test
reviews.comment: I passed my theory test with 100% and hazard perception with 89 out of 100 thanks to these apps. They proved invaluable to me, so to marks to these excellent apps :)
reviews.author: Michael Philip

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: 48/50 for questions and 58/75 for hazard perception.Recommend this app highly.
reviews.author: Steven Riggans

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: Brilliant way to practice your hazard test I find this app was very useful and you can use it on the go which is brilliant not bad for 99p if you ask me, id definitely recommend to a friend or anyone else that wants to practice there hazards .
reviews.author: Lewis Powell

reviews.title: Well worth the 0.99 I spent
reviews.comment: I have HTC one x+ and this works brilliant on it , I love\'d it , I passed with this first time using it , failed 4 times before this using the computer and dvd
reviews.author: Natasha Farnaby

reviews.title: Best one yet
reviews.comment: I have tried a few hazard test i think this is the best you must read the introduction befor you start like it says  as it gives you a clear scoring explanation . It has 10 video clips inall when you click the clip you want it plays it from clip one even if you wanted clip 5 you must still click the hazards at it goes againts your score if you dont but its good practice in the end . Easy to use great app
reviews.author: Rhian Mccarthy

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Nice app
reviews.author: muhammad usman Ghani

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good app
reviews.author: Lucy Thorn

reviews.title: Overall very good.
reviews.comment: Slightly difficult to see hazards in the distance due to video rendering size on Nexus 7. But that\'s not the developer\'s fault.
reviews.author: Stephen Brown

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: Thanks to this app. Passed my test. Got 60/75
reviews.author: Vamsi Mohan

reviews.title: Good I guess
reviews.comment: Today I passed my theory test but this app is abit deceiving, none of the clips was actually on the test which was a shame as I was aceing this app, so my advice is dont hold your breath thinking the clips on this app will appear on the test because for me it didnt, its a good little practice but thats all I can say.
reviews.author: Steven Coeurdelion

reviews.comment: Very useful app!
reviews.author: Alexandra Bolmoaga

reviews.title: Good start
reviews.comment: Good app just need more vids as have 19 in lgv test with higher pass mark
reviews.author: john mckenna

reviews.title: The app that helped
reviews.comment: Really helped me get my awareness sorted and helped hone when to start clicking.
reviews.author: Andrew Blake

reviews.title: Great app if you live in the uk -_-
reviews.comment: Great app if you live in the uk     -_-  but if u dont , I wouldnt get it\'s unrelated to the australian version
reviews.author: safia abubaker

reviews.title: Recommended for theory test revision
reviews.comment: Brilliant video clips. Just passed my theory test using this app. Highly recommend :-)
reviews.author: Jennifer Phillips

reviews.title: I passed with using these 2
reviews.comment: Apps, so 5 stars,!
reviews.author: Matthew Harper

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Very good. Could do with more clips though.
reviews.author: Philip Kerrigan

reviews.title: Don\'t work
reviews.comment: Videos do not play no refund please fix
reviews.author: Rachel Rawlins
